description: Leader of the Gourmet Knights, nothing more is known except that he is afflicted with an illness that he gained from Takimaru when he tries to cure him of a disease from the Gourmet World. He is capable of eating bacteria and viruses, which enables him to devour diseases. He is one of Toriko`s old friends and they have a friendly rivalry to see who can obtain GOD first.
name: Aimaru
